name: Be Yourself (Taeloz)
description:
The goal of the game is to find your partner with the matching color. Your inner color is only visible within the safe spaces.

This game was made for Rainbow Jam 2018.

Controls

Left/Right Arrow:  Move

Space: Jump. You may only jump easily within safe spaces.

'q' + 'p' + Space: Jump. If you are outside of the safe spaces, it is more difficult to jump, although it is sometimes required.

'r': Reset the level.

Escape: Quit the game.
